_header: In all your deeds and your exploits
_description: Aphorisms for living and dying well — in couplets

CamStJohn195.First Lines:
In all your deedes and your exployttesthe lord to guyde your
                    fart…
CamStJohn195.Last Lines:
…And ssall e[ ]pe the fyrie dartesof satannes paynes in
                    hell
CamStJohn195.Note: Added to lower margins by a hand of the sixteenth century.
